p: Figure 1 shows changes in rainbow trout pH during storage at 4 ËšC. An increase in the pH of all samples was observed and the highest pH increase was in the control sample. The pH in zein-coated samples containing EO or extract and the combination of them was lower than control on day 9 (7.28-6.93-6.91-6.79) and day 12 (7.46-7.09-7.12-7.07), respectively.
